---
title: PlistApi.plist_from_xml method
---

Import the #plist_t structure from XML format.

```csharp
public virtual void plist_from_xml(string plistXml, uint length, out PlistHandle plist)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| plist_xml | a pointer to the xml buffer. |
| length | length of the buffer to read. |
| plist | a pointer to the imported plist. |
